titles.title: A resolution to authorize the production of records by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/8/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Select Committee on Intelligence, acting jointly, to provide to the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania, in accordance with appropriate security procedures, the closed session transcript which the court has requested.
